title: Coup de grâce
summary: A coup de grâce (/ˌkuː də ˈɡrɑːs/; French: [ku də ɡʁɑs] (listen) 'blow of mercy') is a death blow to end the suffering of a severely wounded person or animal.[1][2] It may be a mercy killing of mortally wounded civilians or soldiers, friends or enemies, with or without the sufferer's consent.
